title: Learner Analysis Framework Design for Strengthening Cultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sociocultural theories and understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Teacher competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Strengthens capacity to design global education programs by analyzing learners from diverse cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can design a five-step framework for analyzing cultural influence factors.
Learners can derive at least three cultural competency evaluation indicators based on case studies.
Learners can create a learner profiling report reflecting cultural context.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
